content.description:
Charles Willson Peale, George Washington at the Battle of Princeton

Courtesy of the Yale University Art Gallery
content.question: Which of the following best explains the spread of images of George Washington in the United States after the American Revolution?

choices.label: The republican belief that political power should be inherited
The embrace of political party campaigning by electoral candidates
The desire of Americans to develop a new national culture
The refusal of former Loyalists to accept the outcome of the war

content.answer: The desire of Americans to develop a new national culture

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
